statements: SELECT * FROM Shipments;
SELECT shipment_id, origin_location, destination_location FROM Shipments;
SELECT tracking_number, shipping_carrier FROM Shipments WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT * FROM Shipments ORDER BY estimated_delivery_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_shipments FROM Shipments;
SELECT * FROM Shipments WHERE shipment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Shipments WHERE origin_location = 'New York' AND destination_location = 'Los Angeles' AND estimated_delivery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, tracking_number, destination_location FROM Shipments WHERE shipping_carrier = 'UPS' ORDER BY estimated_delivery_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, origin_location, destination_location FROM Shipments WHERE payment_status = 'PAID' AND estimated_delivery_date < NOW();
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_shipments, shipping_carrier FROM Shipments GROUP BY shipping_carrier HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_shipments DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_info
SELECT id, tracking_number, estimated_delivery_date FROM shipping_info
SELECT * FROM payment_details
SELECT order_id, payment_method, payment_status FROM payment_details
SELECT id, tracking_number, shipping_status, estimated_delivery_date FROM shipping_info
SELECT * FROM shipping_info WHERE shipping_status='Shipped';
SELECT id, tracking_number, estimated_delivery_date FROM shipping_info WHERE estimated_delivery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, payment_method, payment_status FROM payment_details WHERE payment_status='Pending' ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT shipping_company, shipping_status FROM shipping_info WHERE shipping_status='In Transit' AND shipping_company='FedEx';
SELECT * FROM shipping_info JOIN payment_details ON shipping_info.id = payment_details.order_id WHERE payment_status='Paid';
SELECT * FROM Shipping;
SELECT tracking_number, carrier_name FROM Shipping WHERE shipping_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PaymentGateway WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT order_id, payment_status FROM PaymentGateway WHERE payment_status = 'PAID';
SELECT shipping_id, status FROM Tracking WHERE status = 'IN TRANSIT';
SELECT * FROM Shipping WHERE shipping_id = 1;
SELECT tracking_number, carrier_name FROM Shipping WHERE estimated_delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Tracking WHERE shipping_id = (SELECT shipping_id FROM Shipping WHERE carrier_name = 'UPS');
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM PaymentGateway WHERE payment_status = 'success';
SELECT tracking_id, status FROM Tracking ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_api;
SELECT order_id, delivery_status FROM shipping_api ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT tracking_number, current_location FROM tracking_api WHERE current_location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM payment_gateway WHERE payment_status = 'completed';
SELECT order_id, street_address, city, zip_code FROM shipping_address ORDER BY city, zip_code DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_api
SELECT tracking_number, delivery_status FROM shipping_api ORDER BY tracking_number
SELECT * FROM tracking_api WHERE estimated_delivery_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT transaction_id, payment_status, amount FROM payment_gateway WHERE payment_status = 'successful'
SELECT street_address, city, zip_code FROM shipping_address
SELECT * FROM ShippingProviders;
SELECT provider_name, api_key FROM ShippingProviders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT shipment_id, tracking_number, shipment_status FROM Shipments WHERE provider_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM PaymentGateways ORDER BY gateway_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT provider_name, api_key FROM ShippingProviders ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, tracking_number, shipment_status FROM Shipments WHERE shipment_status = 'In Transit';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_status FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_id ASC;
